titleStmt.title: The goddesses glory: or, The loyal lover wounded by their splendid beauty To the tune of, Walking beneath the shades. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Gilt-Spur-Street, without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "When the soft winds did blow".
Two lines of printed music at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Gilt-Spur-Street, without Newgate
